BasicInfo.short: Pebble is a company that develops a technology designed for smart watches to connect with iPhone and Android smartphones using Bluetooth.

Products.name: Pebble Steel
Products.description: Pebble Steel is made for looking really good. Equipped with the same great features and 24/7 liveability of the original Pebble.
